dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.ProductOfferingTerm
dataStructure.description:
A condition under which a ProductOffering is made available to Customers. ProductOfferingTerm include ProductOfferingFinancialTerm, which includes such things as acceptable methods of payment, ShipmentTerm, and ServiceTerm.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProductOfferingTerm

child.name: agreementTermOrCondition
child.description:

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ProductTermAppearsAs

This association end is optional
child.label: agreementTermOrCondition
